pages.text: Holding light wards off some mobs of the Forlorn (Compatible with Curios Lanterns)

pages.text: A random land dwelling forlorn denizen may pop out when excavating in the biome

pages.text: Seldomly discovered within Forlorn mobs,becoming sensitive to water, and spreading to any hurt by one

pages.text: Those afflicted with Rabies will suffer damage at the end of its cycle
Guano inflicts slowness whether on top or hit by one
